title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements through stakeholder interviews, market research, and analysis of existing solutions.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for OilPumpSentry, including components for data ingestion, processing, storage, visualization, and security. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, and performance requirements. Outline the technologies and frameworks to be used for each component, focusing on industry-standard tools that are both efficient and reliable. Include a discussion on how real-time inference and near real-time notifications will be integrated into the system architecture.

title: Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Develop a pipeline to ingest and process sensor data from sucker rod pumping systems in near real-time.

title: Machine Learning Model Development
description: Develop and train machine learning models for condition-based maintenance prediction and anomaly detection.

title: Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement a scalable and secure data storage solution for sensor data and model results.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Develop a user-friendly web application for visualizing sensor data, model results, and maintenance notifications.

title: Notification and Alerting System
description: Implement a system for generating and delivering timely notifications and alerts based on model results.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement secure authentication, authorization, and access control mechanisms for the application.

title: Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans for functional, performance, and security testing of the application.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create technical documentation, user guides, and training materials for the application.
